name: Cookie Catcher VR
description:
Catch and eat the cookie with the brown chocolate chips!

Catch and trash the cookie with the green chocolate chips! 

Evade the cookies with the fuse!

Crush the high score, take an in game selfie and share your picture with your friends! (by finding the picture in the game repository)

For the last 2 years I taught myself VR Game Development as a hobby on the side while working full time in a different field . Now I went full game developer and started university for Games Programming in September 2020. This is my first project I did during my course. 

Please leave a comment and give me some feedback and enjoy the game!
